TopicTitle: A-Tech MST (Mass Supply Truck) (All Fuels, + Hover Capable)

Articles.Content:
Allister Technology's Newest Release: A-Tech MST

- Fully Compatible with A-Tech C1, Mosquitos, Powerhog.

- Hover Capable

- Kerbal Moon (both) delivery system included

- Sturdy (Dont turn sharp at 20+ m/s on low gravity... be smart)

- 522 Parts (delivery system included)

- 2110 Electric Charge

- 4320 Liquid Fuel

- 5280 Oxidizer

- 3080 Monopropellant

- 2800 Xenon Gas

- 100% Fun and Kerbal Friendly

- 0 Kerbal to operate: 4 Ladders for Kerbal transportation

Compatibility Test

Getting to Minmus

Landing - Sloped

A-Tech MST can MOVE

Arrived at A-Tech Minmus Base 1

Enjoy.

The Craft File

http://www./?z63oc8jjwmtv6b1

The Colonization Project Main Thread:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/27806-Allister-Technology-Colonization-Project

Edited May 13, 2013 by Allister
A good idea. You often see ships for refueling stuff in orbit, but not many people put out a dedicated lander/base refueling vessel.

A good idea. You often see ships for refueling stuff in orbit, but not many people put out a dedicated lander/base refueling vessel.

Yea, We're looking to establish an efficient stock base, all inter-changeable, with fuel supply and depots for running enjoyable low-gravity rovers -- Fun Factor --.

The A-Tech MST is awesome because it packs a pile of fuel, and is fast and fun to drive. And it flies.
